definition: to follow through/to carry through to the end

sentences.english: And always grouper and snapper," he added.
sentences.chinese: 另外還有始終供應的石斑魚與紅鰭笛鯛魚。

sentences.english: Despite the clouds, the Matterhorn still was a great piece of rock to look at.
sentences.chinese: 除了雲朵外，馬特宏峯看上去始終是塊壯觀的石頭。

sentences.english: This paper lays stress on the fulfillment of students' initiative in English teaching.
sentences.chinese: 本文強調在英語教學中應始終發揮學生的主體作用。

sentences.english: He keeps his head down as his mother blames him.
sentences.chinese: 他母親譴責他時，他始終低着頭。

sentences.english: Anna's constant search for new ideas and challenges keeps her ahead of her times.
sentences.chinese: 對新理念與挑戰的不斷追求令安娜始終走在時代前列。

sentences.english: She never stopped trying to get pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 她始終沒有停止過嘗試受孕。

sentences.english: China always adheres to the road of peaceful development.
sentences.chinese: 中國始終堅持走和平發展道路。

sentences.english: That means programmers have to keep track or recompute how much space is left all the time.
sentences.chinese: 這意味着程序員必須始終跟蹤或重新計算剩餘的空間。

sentences.english: The man always holds woman's hand closely to grasp.
sentences.chinese: 男亽始終抓住女亽旳掱緊緊握著。

sentences.english: Cloud dream frost looking at to sink to eliminate yet always doesn't talk.
sentences.chinese: 雲夢霜看着沉消卻始終沒有說話。

sentences.english: Gated in the field of automation, ANNY will always walk at the forefront of the world.
sentences.chinese: 在自動化門控領域，ANNY將始終走在世界的前列。

sentences.english: We’re reaffirming our commitment to always keep faith with their families.
sentences.chinese: 我們再次重申我們與他們的家人在精神上始終在一起。

sentences.english: First, China sticks to the principle of independence.
sentences.chinese: 第一，中國始終奉行獨立自主的原則。

sentences.english: Hingis stayed steady throughout, never letting Kournikova break away.
sentences.chinese: 辛吉斯始終穩紮穩打，沒有給庫爾尼科娃以可乘之機。

sentences.english: Your inquiries will be always highly appreciated and replied within 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 您的垂詢將始終高度讚賞，並回答了24個小時。

sentences.english: Buffett invests has a characteristic, that is can insist throughout " counter- corruptly".
sentences.chinese: 巴菲特投資有一個特點，那就是始終能堅持“反貪”。

definition: but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
to persevere with/to persist in/to insist on
